com.myronmarston.util
Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.util.FileHelper

public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A class that provides static methods to manage temporary file resources.

          Interface for using a buffered writer.
static interface FileHelper.TempFileUser
          Interface for using a temporary file.

Method Detail

createAndUseTempFile

public static void createAndUseTempFile(java.lang.String tempFilePrefix,
                                        java.lang.String tempFileSuffix,
                                        FileHelper.TempFileUser tempFileUser)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a temporary file, and allows a TempFileUser to use it. When it is complete, the file is deleted.

Parameters:
tempFilePrefix - the temp file prefix
tempFileSuffix - the temp file suffix
tempFileUser - the object that will use the temp file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

createAndUseFileBufferedWriter

public static void createAndUseFileBufferedWriter(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                  FileHelper.BufferedWriterUser bufferedWriterUser)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a buffered writer to write to a file using UTF-8 encoding and allows a BufferedWriterUser to use it. When it is complete, the buffered writer is flushed and all the consumed resources are released.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file
bufferedWriterUser - the object that will use the buffered writer
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

createTextFile

public static void createTextFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                  java.lang.String fileContents)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a text file, using UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the text file
fileContents - the text contents to put in the text file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error

readFileIntoString

public static java.lang.String readFileIntoString(java.lang.String fileName)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Reads the contents of a file into a string using UTF-8 encoding.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file
Returns:
the string contents of the file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
